radiographic_examinations.findings: Splenomegaly, 19 cm in maximal diameter, and patency of the TIPS.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the liver
radiographic_examinations.findings: Marked morphologic features of nodular cirrhosis, signs of portal hypertension, including splenomegaly (19 cm), upper abdominal varices, and a small amount of ascites.

radiographic_examinations.date: Second day of hospitalization after readmission
radiographic_examinations.findings: Cirrhosis with splenomegaly (16.2 cm), a TIPS in the proper position, diffuse wall thickening within the cecum and ascending colon, pericolonic fat stranding, and surrounding subcentimeter lymph nodes.
